name: Lily Chen
action: Spend any number of Health or Sanity, then recover an equal number of Health or Sanity.
passive: When you improve a skill, you may immediately improve that skill again.

name: Norman Withers
action: Spend 2 Clues to discard 1 Monster on a space containing a Gate.
passive: Once per round, you may spend 1 Sanity in place of spending 1 Clue.

name: Jim Culver
action: Each investigator on your space recovers 1 Sanity.
passive: Investigators on your space roll 1 additional die when resolving tests during Combat Encounters.

name: Silas Marsh
action: Move 1 space along a Ship path, then perform 1 additional action.
passive: If you are on a Sea space, investigators on your space roll 1 additional die when resolving tests.

name: Jacqueline Fine
action: You may trade any number of Clues with an investigator on any space.
passive: Once per round, when another investigator gains a non-Common Condition, you may look at the back of that card and gain 1 Clue.

items_to_declare.name: Trish Scarborough
items_to_declare.action: If you do not have any Clues, gain 1 Clue.
items_to_declare.passive: If an investigator on your space spends a Clue to reroll a die, he may reroll up to 2 dice instead.

items_to_declare.name: Akachi Onyele
items_to_declare.action: Look at the top 2 Gates in the Gate stack. Put 1 Gate in the top of the Gate stack and the other on the bottom.
items_to_declare.passive: When you close a Gate during an Other World Encounter, you may move to any space containing a Clue or a Gate.

items_to_declare.name: Diana Stanley
items_to_declare.action: If there is a Cultist Monster on your space, discard all Monsters on your space or move the Cultist Monster to any other space.
items_to_declare.passive: Reduce the horror of Monsters you encounter to 1.

items_to_declare.name: Mark Harrington
items_to_declare.action: You and 1 Monster on your space each lose 1 Health.
items_to_declare.passive: You cannot become Delayed or gain a Detained Condition unless you choose to.

items_to_declare.name: Leo Anderson
items_to_declare.action: Test INFLUENCE. If you pass, gain 1 Ally Asset of your choice from the reserve or the discard pile.
items_to_declare.passive: If you are on a Wilderness space, investigators on your space roll 1 additional die when resolving tests.

items_to_declare.name: Lola Hayes
items_to_declare.action: Spend any number of Improvement tokens, then improve 1 skill of your choice for each token spent (a "+2" token counts as 2 tokens).
items_to_declare.passive: Once per round, an investigator on your space may roll 1 additional die when resolving a test.
